Hello blank fragment
How do I add a recipe? -There is a + symbol in the bottom right corner of the Home Page. Click it to add. What kind of filters are available in the app? -Cuisine, Ovo-Lacto Vegetarian Pesceterian, Vegan, Cannablism Where can I change my dietary preferences? Go to Settings then Preferences.
Don\'t upload swear words on recipes. don\'t be dumb or anoying. We may terminate or suspend our service if any of the terms and conditions are violated. Hallo. dis app is to meke some sort of recipe that u want but u have to do the work and then we just use the internet and take credit. tyty pls like and subscribe.
